statements: DELETE FROM pharmaceutical_inventory WHERE supplier_name = 'PharmaCorp' AND expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM pharmaceutical_inventory WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals' AND quantity <= 100 AND expiration_date <= '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_id = 5 AND supplier_name = 'Supplier A';
DELETE FROM products WHERE quantity_available < 50 AND manufacturer_name = 'Manufacturer B';
DELETE FROM product_inventory WHERE quantity <= 10 AND expiry_date < NOW();
DELETE FROM production WHERE quantity_produced > 100 AND production_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM production WHERE quantity_produced < 1000 AND production_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM distribution WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND distributor_name = 'ABC Distributors';
DELETE FROM supplier WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Supplier';
